danatath ehemane hansi..kellekta balahathkarakamak kalath oya kiyana loku porawal ahala pahalaka hitiyoth katawal deka lok karan anda golu biri garu rangapam karanawa misaka harilawath balanawada?mewwa athdakimen kiyanne..athishaya kalathurakin minihek eekata wiruddhaweyi..oya siddhiyen wechcha karume dan gahaniyakta/kellakta kisima widiyakin balahathkarakamakata/ athawarayakata/jak gahillakata wiruddha wenna bariwena ekayi, mokada ehema kala gaman un kiyanne oya kathawa saha oya goda nagila thiyena gon sanwadawala hatiyata kellata "gona" kiyala thamayi..nikamata hithanna dushanaya karanna hadala minihekta gahuwath oya tikama kiyawi..othana wela thiyenne prayogikawa samajaye wena bahutharayak siduwim gana balana eka neweyi, wargaya wenuwen peni sitimak witharayi..eeka hariyata podu sathurata erehiwenawa wage..ethanadi ee wage siddhi rate wena bawa hithanne na, penne na, danenne na..ekko unta oya wage dewalwalata aduwadi washayen muna dena ammek, sahodariyek, birindak adumagane speyarwil ekakwath na..ehemath nathnam un ee kattiyawa prado, intarkular walin ful gard pita yawanawa wenta oona..nathinam unwa burka asse obala ge mulle thiyan innawa wenta oona!

nathahoth ee karmaya karana kalaye di eewa kirimata upakara wu dana wasthu – mal – suwanda – aayudha – dal aadi karma nimiththak ho minpasu upadina bhawayedi dakinnata labena uyan pokunu – ginidal aadi gathi nimiththak ho ohuge sithata aramunu weyi.
idiri kalaye di dadi mudal prathipaththi kriyamarga sampurna washayen sampreshanaya wimath samaga naya wardhanaya mandagami wanu athayi apekshithaya.
ee nisa wenasak athi kirima sandaha akikaru wima yahapath deyak lesa samaja gatha kala yuthu wa thibe.
eyala kiyanna uthsaha karana de owun pahasuwenma wataha gannawa.
